content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (Position x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of three parallel production units:
- Unit 1: Stone furnace (1.0, 1.0) with burner inserter (1.5, 2.5) outputting to wooden chest (1.5, 3.5)
- Unit 2: Stone furnace (3.0, 1.0) with burner inserter (3.5, 2.5) outputting to wooden chest (3.5, 3.5)
- Unit 3: Stone furnace (5.0, 1.0) with burner inserter (5.5, 2.5) outputting to wooden chest (5.5, 3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Line (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of two parallel production units:
- Unit 1: Stone furnace (2.0, 7.0) with burner inserter (2.5, 8.5) outputting to wooden chest (2.5, 9.5)
- Unit 2: Stone furnace (4.0, 7.0) with burner inserter (4.5, 8.5) outputting to wooden chest (4.5, 9.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position x=11.5-14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
- Input chest (14.5, 11.5)
- Assembling machine 1 (14.5, 14.5) producing copper cable
- Input burner inserter (14.5, 12.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 14.5)
- Output burner inserter (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
- Input chest for iron plates (21.5, 12.5)
- Input burner inserter (21.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 (21.5, 15.5) producing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
- Offshore pump (2.5, 35.5) providing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler (7.0, 35.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine (13.5, 35.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory shortage errors
- Check inventory for required materials before attempting to insert items into machines
- Ensure there is sufficient coal for refueling operations

### Production line efficiency issues
- Assembling machines showing ingredient shortages - ensure proper supply chain of materials
- Copper cable production line needs copper plates
- Electronic circuit production line needs copper cables

### Connection issues
- One offshore pump (Position -5.5, 26.5) is not connected to any fluid system
- Ensure all fluid-carrying entities are properly connected in sequence

### Resource management
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters and boilers regularly
- Keep production lines supplied with raw materials to prevent stoppages
